description: Defines a Flutter widget for the Matches screen, displaying a grid of profile cards and a filters button.

classes.name: MatchesScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing the matches overview screen with a grid of profiles and a filters button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the MatchesScreen, including AppBar, GridView of MatchCards, and a FloatingActionButton.
